Spec: Dark foundation; framed panels; high-contrast pixel typography; organic accents; heavy borders; no glass; no blur; only subtle inner bevels.

Background #141018; PanelBase #2A1633; PanelDark #1C0E22; BorderPrimary #0B070F; BorderHighlight #3B2A46; Accent(Action) #E3A83A; Secondary #7BC96F; Danger #D44747; PvP #B04CE1. One dominant accent per screen.
3px outer Iron Black + 1px inner Soft Ash highlight; square or 2px radius; no soft drop shadows.
Title uppercase heavy pixel font (1.6x); major buttons 1.2x; secondary 1.0x; meta 0.85x; no thin weights.
Slab: Deep Plum bg; 3px border; hover border pulses to amber + 1px lift; press scale 0.97 + darken + click SFX; no bounce/gradient anim.
Snap transitions 120–180ms; mechanical weighted pulses; avoid floaty easing.
data/ui/ui_style_guide.json + wildlands_theme.css; NO inline styles; lint/log once on violation; base components apply classes.
